title: dataset
description: Describe the nature, shape, number of items and other properties of the dataset involved in your task. If you are performing inferences, please indicate the average size of the data sent for a single inference and fill in the number of inferences in the propertiy: inferenceProperties

dataType.description: the nature of the data used for training/retraining/finetuning etc, if you're performing inferences, directly go to the field nbRequests

fileType.description: the file type of the dataset

volume.description: the size of the dataset (in Go)

shape.description: the shape of your dataset, can be found with X.shape with dataframes, e.g. (12, 1000) for a 2D table with 12 columns and 1000 rows

source.description: the kind of source of the dataset

sourceUri.description: the URI of the dataset if available

owner.description: the owner of the dataset if available

nbRequest.description: the number of requests the measure corresponds to (for example 100 prompts or 100 images), 0 or empty if you're not measuring the inference stage

inputDataType.description: the type of data used as the input of the model

nbInput.description: the number of data in the input, e.g. 3 images, audio or tokens

outputDataType.description: the type of data returned by the model

nbOutput.description: the number of data generated by the model

contextWindowsSize.description: the number of tokens your system keeps in memory to generate the next answer

cache.description: the presence of a cache function in the system, true or false
